alert.note: Alert for Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 2:16PM PST until December 15 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 1 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Interstate 5 from Central point south, including the cities of Central Point, Medford, Phoenix, Talent and Ashland. Portions of highway 62 including the cities of White City and Eagle Point and highway 238 east of Jacksonville. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 1 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected to be south of Medford. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
